description:
Neoprene pants to keep you warm when the sea level rises over the gunwhale or you're paddling in a cool breeze. Wear them alone or as liners for your favourite board shorts.

  • Polyester and Spandex face fabric is bonded to 0.5mm petroleum-free neoprene
  • Nylon and polyester lining feels nice against your skin
  • Eco-Stretch neoprene is limestone-based and designed for comfort and warmth
  • Elastic waistband provides a precise yet flexible fit
  • Side pockets keep your snacks handy
  • UPF 50+ protects you from UV rays
  • Flat lock stitched seams throughout
  • Horizontal seams with bartacked edges let you cut the leg to the ideal length for you
name: Level Six Jericho Neoprene Pants - Men's
